summary: This is an email chain from September 14, 2020, regarding the transfer of a large (approximately 11GB) file from PBSA (Palm Beach Sheriff's Office) containing their entire Epstein file for the case referenced as 2020PR000426AMB. The emails coordinate the download and storage of this investigative material on a shared drive.

events.title: PBSA Epstein File Transfer
events.description: The Palm Beach Sheriff's Office (PBSA) provides their entire Epstein investigative file, approximately 11GB in size, for download in relation to case 2020PR000426AMB.

keyFacts: The Palm Beach Sheriff's Office (PBSA) transferred their entire Epstein investigative file, which was about 11GB in size.
The file transfer was related to the case referenced as JEFFREY E EPSTEIN, 2020PR000426AMB.
The emails coordinate the download and storage of the file on a shared drive path labeled 'USvEpstein-2018R01618 Investigation PBSA Epstein File'.
The document is an internal email chain dated September 14, 2020, showing procedural steps in evidence handling.
